sentences.en: In tiptoeing gingerly around one of the last Maoist shibboleths-collective landownership-the party may yet be sowing the seeds of the rural transformation it promises.
sentences.cn: 土地集体所有制毛派最后的几个堡垒之一，中共小心翼翼地触到了它，中共兴许能在其承诺的农村转型中有所建树。

sentences.en: The study is from the viewpoint of landownership distribution to analysis the influence to leisure agriculture.
sentences.cn: 本文主要是以土地所有权分配的角度,分析其对休闲农业发展的影响.

sentences.en: This may be partly for fear of making a near-reality of private landownership, which would undermine one of the last vestiges of the party’s communist heritage.
sentences.cn: 这要部分归结于中共害怕在实际上造成土地私有制之嫌，因为这样会摧毁其共产主义的最后一道防线。
